    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structural formula of paracetamol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strukturelle Formel von paracetamol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formule structurale de paracétamol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fórmula estrutural do paracetamol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formula strutturale del paracetamol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομικός τύπος της παρακεταμόλης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fórmula estructural del paracetamol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structural formula of paracetamol. The bond labelled 1 gives rise to strong absorption of paracetamol at 1700 cm-1. This is used for an exercise on the infrared spectrum of paracetamol.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paracetamol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavenumber</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die strukturelle Formel von 
paracetamol. Die beschriftete Bindung 1 verursacht starke 
Absorption von paracetamol bei 1700 cm-1. Dieses wird für eine 
Übung auf dem Infrarotspektrum von paracetamol verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formule structurale 
du paracétamol. L'obligation étiquetée 1 provoque l'absorption
forte du paracétamol à 1700 cm-1. Ceci est utilisé pour un 
exercice sur le spectre infrarouge du paracétamol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a fórmula estrutural do 
paracetamol. A ligação etiquetada 1 causa o absorption forte 
do paracetamol em 1700 cm-1. Isto é usado para um exercício no
spectrum infravermelho do paracetamol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formula strutturale
del paracetamol. Il legame identificato 1 provoca l'assorbimento
forte del paracetamol a 1700 cm-1. Ciò è usata per 
un'esercitazione sullo spettro infrarosso del paracetamol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δομικό τύπο της 
παρακεταμόλης. Ο δεσμός επονομαζόμενος 1 προκαλεί την 
ισχυρή απορρόφηση της παρακεταμόλης 1700 cm-1. Αυτό 
χρησιμοποιείται για μια άσκηση στο υπέρυθρο φάσμα της 
παρακεταμόλης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el fórmula estructural
del paracetamol. El enlace etiquetado 1 da lugar a la absorción
fuerte del paracetamol en 1700 cm-1. Esto se utiliza para un 
ejercicio en el espectro infrarrojo del paracetamol.</string>
          </description>
